name: Old Twitter Theme Pre-2018
description:
This theme uses components from 2015-2017 Twitter to create a nostalgic experience. Features square avatars, buttons with gradients and more.
NOTE: Please use the add-on GoodTwitter, otherwise it won't work. https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/goodtwitter/jbanhionoclikdjnjlcmefiofgjimgca
I won't be able to troubleshoot errors with the GoodTwitter add-on.
additional_info: IF THERE IS AN ISSUE, SEND ME A MESSAGE OF THE PROBLEM AND TELL ME WHICH PAGE IT IS ON SO I CAN GET RIGHT ON IT.
